EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal's First Asia Pacific Summit - Hear from our Customers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
“With Pivotal, a volume of data that previously took us two days to load now takes less than 20 minutes — and sometimes just seconds.” <http://www.pivotalsummit.shobiziems.com/> -Seinosuke Sato, Co-founder and Director, BrainPad Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
BrainPad, headquartered in Tokyo, is a leader in delivering data analytics to organizations to help improve sales and marketing ROI. When BrainPad launched CloudStock, demand exceeded expectations — and the amount of data customers generated far exceeded performance capabilities of the company’s existing database.
After evaluating several database solutions against its criteria of scalability, low maintenance costs, and usability, BrainPad selected Pivotal. BrainPad experienced business benefits almost instantly — Increased performance, reduced data loading and processing time and ease of use for their customers.
This is just one example of how Pivotal is helping to ensure the success of our customers. Would you like to hear other success stories? On October 23 & 24, other Pivotal customers will be joining us to share their own experiences at our first Asia Pacific Summit <http://www.pivotalsummit.shobiziems.com/> in Singapore. Register now for the opportunity to learn from our happy customers and how they are:
- Using big data and predictive analytics to create new business value - Leveraging real-time data to gain competitive advantage - Building, deploying and scaling applications more quickly and easily than ever before
Pivotal is changing the way the world handles data. Harnessing the power of Hadoop and using fast SQL querying, it taps into vast amounts of data to provide organizations worldwide with insights that can be used to to create new business value and identify new opportunities and revenue streams.
<http://www.pivotalsummit.shobiziems.com/register.php>
We hope you can join us. The Pivotal Team
